	[Sessions_Client_ID] [varchar](255)  NULL,

	[Sessions_Browser_Type] [varchar](255)  NULL,
	[Sessions_Browser] [varchar](255)  NULL,
	[Sessions_Session_Number] [varchar](255)  NULL,
	[Sessions_Hour] [varchar](255)  NULL,
	[Sessions_Session_Duration_Export] [varchar](255)  NULL,
	[Sessions_Traffic_Source] [varchar](255)  NULL,

	[Sessions_Search_Phrase] [varchar](255)  NULL,
	[PageViews_Campaign_PV] [varchar](255)  NULL,

	[Events_Position] [varchar](255)  NULL,

	[Events_Event_Type] [varchar](255)  NULL,
	[Events_Payment_Method] [varchar](255)  NULL,
	[Events_Shipping_Method] [varchar](255)  NULL,
	[Events_Sku] [varchar](255)  NULL,
	[Events_Quantity] [varchar](255)  NULL,
	[Events_Stock] [varchar](255)  NULL,
	[Events_Price] [varchar](255)  NULL,
	[Events_Currency] [varchar](255)  NULL,
	[Events_Order_Total_Amount] [varchar](255)  NULL,
	[VisitCount] [int]  NOT NULL

WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	HEAP
)
